cast.name: 埃普利·L·埃尔南德斯 April L. Hernandez

introduction: TLOM (a new entertainment brand licensed by Time Warner Company) is an artist cooperative exclusively for successful independent artists throughout European, Canadian, Australian, and North and South American territories. As a coop organization FTLOM projects are owned and operated by the association of these independent artists and curators united voluntarily to meet their common economic and social career aspirations at a commercial level through a democratically-controlled enterprise or joint venture. The FTLOM coop solely benefits those using its network and services. Profits and earnings generated from various ventures within the coop are distributed among the members, also known as owning-artists. Written by Paramount Pictures
